scripts.build: webpack --mode production && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build-demo: webpack --mode production && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config.demo.yml
scripts.netlify: rm -rf dist/* && webpack && concurrently -k -n "WEBPACK,JEKYLL" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "webpack -w" "bundle exec jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config.local.yml"
scripts.start: rm -rf dist/* && webpack && concurrently -k -n "WEBPACK,JEKYLL,BROWSERSYNC" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold" "webpack -w" "bundle exec jekyll build --watch --config _config.yml,_config.local.yml" "browser-sync start -s _site -f _site --extensions html"
